an3.126:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno yena kapilavatthu tadavasari.
an3.126:4.4: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:4.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.126:5.1: “Gaccha, mahānāma, kapilavatthusmiṃ, tathārūpaṃ āvasathaṃ jāna yatthajja mayaṃ ekarattiṃ vihareyyāmā”ti.
an3.126:5.2: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavato paṭissutvā kapilavatthuṃ pavisitvā kevalakappaṃ kapilavatthuṃ anvāhiṇḍanto nāddasa kapilavatthusmiṃ tathārūpaṃ āvasathaṃ yatthajja bhagavā ekarattiṃ vihareyya.
an3.126:6.1: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:6.3: “natthi, bhante, kapilavatthusmiṃ tathārūpo āvasatho yatthajja bhagavā ekarattiṃ vihareyya.
an3.126:6.4: Ayaṃ, bhante, bharaṇḍu kālāmo bhagavato purāṇasabrahmacārī.
an3.126:6.7: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavato paṭissutvā yena bharaṇḍussa kālāmassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:6.8: upasaṅkamitvā santharaṃ paññāpetvā udakaṃ ṭhapetvā pādānaṃ dhovanāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:6.10: “santhato, bhante, santhāro, udakaṃ ṭhapitaṃ pādānaṃ dhovanāya.
an3.126:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena bharaṇḍussa kālāmassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:7.7: Sve dānāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsissāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an3.126:8.1: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:8.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.126:8.4: “tayo khome, mahānāma, satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.126:8.6: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco satthā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti;
an3.126:8.7: na rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti.
an3.126:8.8: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco satthā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti;
an3.126:8.10: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco satthā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti.
an3.126:8.11: Ime kho, mahānāma, tayo satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.126:8.12: Imesaṃ, mahānāma, tiṇṇaṃ satthārānaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhā”ti?
an3.126:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:9.3: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:9.5: Dutiyampi kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:9.7: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:9.9: Tatiyampi kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:9.11: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.126:10.1: Atha kho bharaṇḍu kālāmassa etadahosi:
an3.126:10.2: “mahesakkhassa vatamhi mahānāmassa sakkassa sammukhā samaṇena gotamena yāvatatiyaṃ apasādito.
an3.126:10.4: Atha kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo kapilavatthumhā pakkāmi.
an3.126:10.5: Yaṃ kapilavatthumhā pakkāmi tathā pakkantova ahosi na puna paccāgacchīti.
